name: Ruul
content:
Ruul was a Dathomirian Zabrak male from the planet Dathomir who was part of a clan of the Nightbrothers during the Clone Wars. Prior to the Second Battle of Dathomir of 19 BBY, Ruul met with Mak Eak, a Nightbrother leader, in a warehouse-like building on a mission for the runaway Nightbrother Arzo Suun to help steal supplies for Eak. Ruul and Eak were eventually caught by a group of Nightsisters led by Nelsel, who detected the Nightbrothers' presence through the Force.
Ruul was mentioned in Collapse of the Republic, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
